# Histogramme simple

```{r}
hist(iris[,1])
```


# Density avec les points

```{r}
d <- density(iris[,1])
plot(d, type="n", main="Densité")
polygon(d, col="lightgray", border="gray")
rug(iris[,1], col="red")
```
